Package com.example.marill_many_events.models

Class FirebaseRegistration

java.lang.Object
com.example.marill_many_events.models.FirebaseRegistration
public class FirebaseRegistration extends Object
FirebaseRegistration handles user registration, profile updates, and related operations involving Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FirebaseRegistration(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore firestore, com.google.firebase.storage.StorageReference storageReference, String deviceId, UserCallback callback)
    Constructs a FirebaseRegistration instance for handling user-related operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteProfilePicture()
    Deletes the current profile picture from Firebase Storage and removes the download link reference from Firestore.
    void
    deleteUser()
    Deletes the user record from Firestore.
    void
    loadUserDetails()
    Loads user details from Firestore if in edit mode.
    void
    registerUser(String name, String email, String phone, android.net.Uri profilePictureUri)
    Registers a new user in Firestore and uploads a profile picture to Firebase Storage if provided.
    void
    updateProfilePictureUrl(String profilePictureUrl)
    Updates the profile picture URL in Firestore.
    void
    updateUser(String name, String email, String phone, android.net.Uri profilePictureUri)
    Updates an existing user's details in Firestore and uploads a new profile picture if provided.

  • Constructor Details

    • FirebaseRegistration

      public FirebaseRegistration(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore firestore, com.google.firebase.storage.StorageReference storageReference, String deviceId, UserCallback callback)
      Constructs a FirebaseRegistration instance for handling user-related operations.
      Parameters:
      firestore - The FirebaseFirestore instance.
      storageReference - The StorageReference instance for Firebase Storage.
      deviceId - The unique device ID for the user.
      callback - The callback interface for user actions.

  • Method Details

    • loadUserDetails

      public void loadUserDetails()
      Loads user details from Firestore if in edit mode.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(String name, String email, String phone, android.net.Uri profilePictureUri)
      Updates an existing user's details in Firestore and uploads a new profile picture if provided.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      email - The email of the user.
      phone - The phone number of the user.
      profilePictureUri - The URI of the new profile picture.

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(String name, String email, String phone, android.net.Uri profilePictureUri)
      Registers a new user in Firestore and uploads a profile picture to Firebase Storage if provided.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      email - The email of the user.
      phone - The phone number of the user.
      profilePictureUri - The URI of the profile picture.

    • deleteProfilePicture

      public void deleteProfilePicture()
      Deletes the current profile picture from Firebase Storage and removes the download link reference from Firestore.

    • updateProfilePictureUrl

      public void updateProfilePictureUrl(String profilePictureUrl)
      Updates the profile picture URL in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      profilePictureUrl - The new profile picture URL.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser()
      Deletes the user record from Firestore.
